items.mnemonic: A single, horizontal stroke. It's the simplest representation of 'one'.
Two horizontal strokes. Simple and direct.
Three horizontal strokes. It follows the pattern of one and two.

items.kunyomi: よっ-つ, よん, よ
items.mnemonic: A box (囗) with two legs (儿) inside. Imagine a four-legged animal in a pen.

sentence.en: There are four seasons in a year.

items.mnemonic: Looks like two strokes with a roof and a floor, representing the five elements or five fingers.
A top hat (亠) over the number eight (八).
Looks like a person cut in half, or a stylized number 7.
Two strokes spreading out, like dividing something. Represents eight, a number of prosperity.

meaning.en: A person who is friendly to everyone

sentence.en: I wake up at eight o'clock.

items.mnemonic: Looks like a fish hook or a bent arm trying to reach for something.

sentence.jp: 九月は私の誕生日です。

items.mnemonic: A cross, like a plus sign. A simple and powerful symbol for ten.

sentence.jp: 会議は十分で終わります。
sentence.en: The meeting will end in ten minutes.

items.mnemonic: One (一) line is taken from 'white' (白) to mean one hundred.
A combination of ten (十) and a single stroke on top. Imagine ten of ten... and then some more!
Looks like a scorpion (a creature with many legs), representing a large number like ten thousand.

sentence.jp: 彼は一万円をなくした。

items.mnemonic: A box with a line inside. It represents a round coin, hence Yen.
A pictograph of the sun. A box with a line in the middle.
A pictograph of the crescent moon with clouds floating by.

sentence.en: The moon is beautiful, isn't it?

items.mnemonic: A person (人) with sparks flying from their arms. A pictograph of a dancing flame.

sentence.en: I'm going to see the fireworks.

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of flowing water, with a central stream and splashes on the sides.
A pictograph of a tree with a trunk and branches reaching out.

sentence.jp: この机は木でできています。
sentence.en: This desk is made of wood.

items.mnemonic: A roof over the earth (土) with two nuggets of gold beside it. Represents precious metal from the ground.
A pictograph of a mound of earth or a plant sprouting from the ground.

sentence.en: The soil in the garden is black.

items.mnemonic: The wings of a turkey (隹) flying towards the sun (日) on a weekday.

sentence.en: What day of the week is it today?

items.mnemonic: A person (丿) carrying a shield (干). A farmer's whole year of work.

sentence.en: I will go to Japan next year.

items.mnemonic: The sun (日) at a temple (寺) tells you the time.
The sun (日) shining through a gate (門), indicating the passage of time or space.

sentence.jp: 駅と銀行の間にあります。
sentence.en: It is between the station and the bank.

items.onyomi: フン, ブン, プン
items.mnemonic: Using a sword (刀) to divide (八) something into parts or minutes.

sentence.jp: 日本語が分かりますか。

items.mnemonic: Two lines on top, like it's splitting the 'cow' (牛) kanji in half, but it's simpler.

sentence.jp: 一時半に会いましょう。

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a pestle, used for pounding rice around noon.
Something tied up (top part) being cut by a sword (刂). Preparing something before an event.

sentence.en: Let's meet in front of the station.

items.mnemonic: A step (彳) taken by a small (幺) person who is following behind (夂).
A person with a roof over their head, thinking about the present moment, 'now'.
To walk (辶) around a full cycle (周), which takes a week.

sentence.en: What will you do on the weekend?

items.mnemonic: A person (人) with their mother (母), whom they see every day.

sentence.jp: 毎朝、ジョギングをします。

items.kunyomi: あ-かり, あか-るい, あ-した
items.mnemonic: The sun (日) and the moon (月) together make everything bright.

sentence.jp: 部屋はとても明るいです。

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a person walking, with two legs.
A man uses his power (力) in the rice field (田).

sentence.jp: あの男の人は先生です。

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a woman kneeling gracefully.
A pictograph of a small child with outstretched arms.

sentence.jp: 公園に子供がたくさんいます。
sentence.en: There are many children in the park.

items.mnemonic: Looks like a man holding two sticks or axes, a symbol of a father's protective role.
Derived from the kanji for 'woman' (女) with two dots representing her breasts, symbolizing motherhood.

sentence.jp: 母の料理は美味しいです。

items.mnemonic: A big mouth (口) on legs (儿), the older brother who gives orders.

sentence.jp: 私には兄が一人います。

items.mnemonic: A woman (女) who goes to the market (市). The responsible older sister.

sentence.en: My older sister is a university student.

items.mnemonic: Looks like a little figure with a bow on his head, a playful younger brother.

sentence.en: My younger brother is still a high school student.

items.mnemonic: A woman (女) who is not yet (未) fully grown. Your younger sister.

sentence.jp: 妹はピアノを習っています。
sentence.en: My younger sister is learning the piano.

items.mnemonic: Two right hands (又) coming together in friendship.
Grain (禾) guarded by a hook, representing something private or personal.
A pictograph of an open mouth.
A pictograph of an eye, rotated 90 degrees.
A pictograph of an ear.
A pictograph of a hand with fingers.
A mouth (口) above a person's leg (止), representing a foot.

items.kunyomi: うえ, あ-がる, のぼ-る
items.mnemonic: A line above a base, indicating an 'up' or 'above' position.

sentence.jp: 本は机の上にあります。
sentence.en: The book is on the desk.

items.kunyomi: した, さ-がる, くだ-る
items.mnemonic: A line below a base, indicating a 'down' or 'below' position.

sentence.jp: 靴はベッドの下にあります。
sentence.en: The shoes are under the bed.

items.mnemonic: A line going through the middle of a box (口).

sentence.jp: 箱の中に何がありますか。

items.mnemonic: Evening (夕) and a magic wand (ト). When it gets dark, you go outside to see the magic of the night.
Your right hand (ナ) goes to your mouth (口) when you eat.

sentence.jp: 右に曲がってください。

items.mnemonic: The left hand holds the tool (工) for work.

sentence.jp: ポストは左にあります。
sentence.en: The postbox is on the left.

items.mnemonic: The sun (日) rising behind a tree (木) in the east.

sentence.jp: 東京は日本の東にあります。
sentence.en: Tokyo is in the east of Japan.

items.mnemonic: A bird in a nest, seen as the sun setting in the west.

sentence.en: The sun sets in the west.

items.mnemonic: A shelter with a cross (十). People build shelters facing south for warmth.
Two people sitting back-to-back to stay warm in the cold north.

sentence.jp: 北海道は日本の北にあります。
sentence.en: Hokkaido is in the north of Japan.

items.mnemonic: A king or jewel (玉) inside an enclosure (囗), representing a country's border and its treasures.

sentence.jp: あなたの国はどこですか。

items.mnemonic: A head (首) walking (辶) along a path. The path you follow with your head held high.
A horse (馬) at a post station. Historically, stations were for changing horses.

sentence.jp: 東京駅はとても大きいです。

items.mnemonic: A fortune teller (占) under a roof (广), which is their shop.

sentence.jp: あの店は九時に閉まります。

items.mnemonic: A pig (豕) under a roof (宀). In the past, livestock was kept in the house.

sentence.jp: 私の家は駅から近いです。
sentence.en: My house is near the station.

items.mnemonic: An altar (示) on the earth (土) forms a shrine, a center of the community or company.

sentence.en: My father is the president of a company.

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a chariot viewed from above, with an axle and two wheels.

sentence.en: I will go to the station by car.

items.kunyomi: そら, あ-く, から
items.mnemonic: A hole (穴) made by a tool (工). An empty space, like the sky.
A rice field (田) with a nail (丁), marking the boundary of a town.

sentence.jp: この町はとても静かです。

items.mnemonic: A flag waving in a certain direction (方) as people travel.

sentence.en: I will travel during the summer vacation.

items.mnemonic: To use a brush (聿) to say (曰) something on paper.
To sell (売) words (言). A storyteller reads tales to an audience.

sentence.jp: 本を読むのが好きです。

items.mnemonic: An ear (耳) at a gate (門), listening for someone or asking who is there.
A pictograph of a crossroads, representing movement and going somewhere.
Represents wheat, which comes from the fields.

sentence.en: My friend is coming to my house.

items.mnemonic: A person (left part) sweeping with a broom (帚), cleaning up before returning home.
A roof over something good (良), representing food to eat.
You need food (食) but you lack (欠) something to drink.
An eye (目) on legs (儿), walking around to see things.
A mouth with sound waves coming out, representing words being said.

sentence.jp: もう一度言ってください。

items.mnemonic: Words (言) that come from a tongue of a thousand (千) stories.

sentence.jp: 日本語で話しましょう。

items.mnemonic: A person under a roof, gathering for a meeting.
A net (罒) used to catch shellfish (貝), which were once used as money to buy things.

sentence.jp: 新しい服を買いたいです。
sentence.en: I want to buy new clothes.

items.mnemonic: A samurai (士) as a merchant. The top part represents the item being sold.
A person (人) leaning against a tree (木) to rest.
Two mountains (山) stacked on top of each other, representing something emerging or coming out.
A pictograph of a tipi or tent flap, something you enter.

sentence.jp: 部屋に入ってください。

items.mnemonic: A person standing firmly on the ground.

sentence.jp: ここに立ってください。

items.mnemonic: A person taking small steps (彳) at a temple (寺), waiting for someone.

sentence.en: I am waiting for the bus.

items.mnemonic: A hand (手) at a temple (寺), holding something precious.

sentence.jp: 荷物を持ってください。

items.mnemonic: A person (亻) from the past (乍) making something.
A person (亻) managing a historical official or scribe.

items.kunyomi: おし-える, おそ-わる
items.mnemonic: A teacher teaching filial piety (孝) to a child (子) with a stick (攵).

sentence.jp: 先生が日本語を教えています。

items.mnemonic: A person made of earth (土) running away, with their legs (止) moving fast.
To stop (止) for a little (少) while during a walk.

sentence.en: I walk to the station every day.

items.mnemonic: To run (走) after you yourself (己) get up.

sentence.en: I get up at 6 o'clock every morning.

items.mnemonic: Under a roof (宀), a person lies on a bed (right part) to sleep.

sentence.en: I go to sleep at 11 PM.

items.kunyomi: おお-きい, おお-いに
items.mnemonic: A person (人) with arms stretched wide to show how big something is.
A vertical line with two small dots, representing something small.
A tall building with a roof, multiple floors, and a base.

sentence.jp: このビルはとても高いです。

items.mnemonic: A woman (女) under a roof (宀), feeling safe and at peace.
To stand (立) by a tree (木) and chop it with an axe (斤) to make something new.

sentence.jp: 新しい車を買いました。

items.mnemonic: Ten (十) mouths (口) telling stories from old times.
A pictograph of an old person with long hair, representing 'long' or 'leader'.
Two evenings (夕) stacked on top of each other. Many nights have passed.
A small (小) amount, with a line representing a bit more.
A drop of sunlight (日), which is white.
Earth (土) on fire (灬), glowing red.

sentence.jp: そのドレスは赤いです。

items.mnemonic: A plant (生) growing under the moon (月), appearing blue in the dim light.
A window (里) covered in soot from a fire (灬), making it black.

sentence.jp: 黒い犬を飼っています。

items.mnemonic: A woman (女) and a child (子) together, a picture of love and fondness.
The number two (二) on legs (儿), representing the origin or beginning of things.
The sun (日) with a cross (十) on top, representing the sun early in the morning.

sentence.en: I wake up early in the morning.

items.mnemonic: The sun (日) making a person (者) feel hot.
Under a roof (宀), a person huddles with straw (bottom part) and ice (冫) outside, feeling cold.
A strong bow (弓) used by an insect (虫) - imagine a very strong ant.
The blue (青) of a calm battle (争). A serene, quiet scene after a conflict.
A woman (女) who has a concurrent (兼) feeling of dislike.
A pictograph of a mountain with three peaks.
A pictograph of flowing water in a river.

sentence.jp: 家の近くに川があります。
sentence.en: There is a river near my house.

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a rice paddy, divided into four sections.

sentence.jp: 田んぼで米を作ります。
sentence.en: They grow rice in the rice fields.

items.mnemonic: A plant (艹) that changes (化) into a beautiful flower.

sentence.jp: 庭にきれいな花が咲いています。
sentence.en: Beautiful flowers are blooming in the garden.

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a cloud with raindrops falling down.
What is above the big person (大)? The heavens.

sentence.jp: 今日の天気はどうですか。

items.mnemonic: Steam (气) coming from rice (米) as it cooks. Represents energy, air, or spirit.
Rain (雨) from the sky that extends down like lightning, representing electricity.
A pictograph of a dog, with a dot representing its collar or eye.

sentence.jp: 犬を散歩に連れて行きます。
sentence.en: I'm taking the dog for a walk.

items.mnemonic: A beast (豸) that lives with seedlings (苗) in a field. A cat that roams the farm.
A pictograph of a bird with a crest, eye, and tail feathers.

sentence.jp: 鳥が空を飛んでいます。
sentence.en: A bird is flying in the sky.

items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a fish with a head, body, and tail fins (灬).

sentence.jp: 魚を釣るのが好きです。

items.mnemonic: In the evening (夕), you use your mouth (口) to say your name because it's hard to see.
A person (儿) with a plant growing on their head, symbolizing growth and moving ahead.

items.kunyomi: う-まれる, い-きる, なま
items.mnemonic: A pictograph of a plant sprouting from the ground (土), symbolizing life and birth.
A child (子) under a roof (宀) is learning.

sentence.jp: 日本語を学んでいます。

items.mnemonic: Trees (木) where people meet and exchange (交) knowledge, which is a school.

sentence.jp: 学校は八時に始まります。

items.mnemonic: A tree (木) with a line at the bottom, indicating its roots or origin. Also means book.

sentence.jp: これは日本語の本です。

meaning.vi: ngôn ngữ, từ, kể chuyện, ngữ

items.mnemonic: Words (言) that I (吾) speak make up a language.
A flower (top part) in the middle (央) of England's beautiful gardens.
A pictograph of a muscular arm, symbolizing power and strength.
A person (亻) carrying a large sign asking 'what?'
Words (言) used to ask about a turkey (隹) - 'Who is that?'
A mysterious figure escaping with power (力). You need exertion to study.

sentence.jp: 毎日、二時間勉強します。
sentence.en: I study for two hours every day.
